p: In all experimental protocol, the mean survival time was extended by the extract of A. polystachyus demonstrating suppression of the parasitemia which was due to the P.berghei infection. However, all doses of the extract (100, 200, and 400 mg/kg) failed to cure the P.berghei infection. The bioactive compound of medicinal plants that prolonged survival time greater than twelve days, it is considered as active. 49
